name: Hydra-Essentiel [HAu00b2] Bi-phase Serum
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acids: Provide continuous, multilevel, and long-lasting hydration..-Organic Leaf of Life Extract: Intensely hydrates and visibly plumps skin..-Saffron Flower Polyphenols: Support balanced microbiota and address sebum regulation....Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Glycerin, Isononyl Isononanoate, Propanediol, Betaine, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Kalanchoe Pinnata Leaf Extract, Alcohol, Tocopherol, Tris (Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Arbutus Unedo Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Crocus Sativus Flower Extract, CI 42090/Blue 1, CI 61565/Green 6.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Warm a small amount of serum in your hands..-Apply gently to your face and neck..-Apply draining pressure three times on each cheek, three times on your forehead, and three times on each side of your neck..-Follow with Hydra-Essentiel Silky Moisturizer with Double Dose Hyaluronic Acid (sold separately) for perfectly hydrated skin.
